answers.answer: Hi...Sorry you're having such troubles....It can be very scary not knowing what is going on with your own body...Have you any blood work done for B12 deficiency, diabetes, etc??  There are many things that can cause the symptoms you're having....I hope maybe a doctor might help you more.Take care and feel better soon.T.

question: I'm 38 yrs old and I'm shaking on my right side.  this also comes with tingling ing my fingers and in my right foot.  I've also experince my fingers and toes on my right side to lock up (can't move at all).  I've had MRI EEG Cat Scan any test you can think of and the Doctors can't find anything wrong. Can you please Help me?
title: What is happening to me?
